00081 /**
00082    ## FUNCTION: 
00083         clusterPockets
00084 
00085    ## SPECIFICATION:
00086         This function takes in argument a list of vertice, and perform a first
00087         clusturing algorithm to merge vertices close from each others. The distance
00088         criteria is in the params struct.
00089 
00090    ## PARAMETRES:
00091         @ s_lst_vvertice *lvvert : The list of vertices.
00092         @ s_fparams *params      : Parameters
00093 
00094    ## RETURN:
00095         list of pockets!
00096   
00097 */
00098 c_lst_pockets *clusterPockets(s_lst_vvertice *lvvert, s_fparams *params)
00099 {
00100         int i = -1,
00101                 j = -1,
00102                 curPocketId=1,
00103                 vNb[4] = {0,0,0,0};
00104 
00105         
00106         s_vvertice *vertices = lvvert->vertices,
00107                            *vcur = NULL ;
00108 
00109         c_lst_pockets *pockets = c_lst_pockets_alloc();         
00110                 
00111         for(i=0;i<lvvert->nvert;i++) {
00112                 vcur = vertices + i ;
00113                 for(j=0;j<4;j++) vNb[j] = vcur->vneigh[j];
00114 
00115                 curPocketId=updateIds(lvvert,i,vNb,vcur->resid, curPocketId,pockets, params);
00116         }
00117 
00118         node_pocket *p = pockets->first ;
00119         while(p) {
00120                 p->pocket->size = p->pocket->v_lst->n_vertices ;
00121                 p = p->next ;
00122         }
00123 
00124         if(pockets->n_pockets > 0) return pockets ;
00125         else {
00126                 my_free(pockets) ;
00127                 return NULL ;
00128         }
00129 }
00130 
00131 /**
00132    ## FUNCTION: 
00133         updateIds
00134   
00135    ## SPECIFICATION:
00136         Update ids.
00137   
00138    ## PARAMETRES:
00139         @ s_lst_vvertice *lvvert : The list of vertices.
00140         @ int i                                  : 
00141         @ int *vNb                               : 
00142         @ int resid                              :  
00143         @ int curPocket                  :
00144         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets : The current list of pockets.
00145         @ s_fparams *params              : Parameters
00146   
00147    int
00148   
00149 */
00150 int updateIds(s_lst_vvertice *lvvert, int i, int *vNb, int resid, int curPocket,
00151                           c_lst_pockets *pockets, s_fparams *params)
00152 {
00153 /*      s_pocket *curPocket; */
00154         int filteredIdx,j,z;
00155         int groupCreatedFlag=0;
00156         int cur_n_apol=0;
00157         int cur_n_pol=0;
00158 
00159         s_vvertice *vertices = lvvert->vertices ;
00160         s_vvertice *vert = &(vertices[i]),
00161                            *fvert = NULL ;
00162 
00163         for(j=0;j<4;j++) {
00164                 if(vNb[j] < lvvert->qhullSize && vNb[j] > 0) {
00165                         filteredIdx = lvvert->tr[vNb[j]];
00166                         if(filteredIdx!=-1 && filteredIdx < lvvert->nvert){
00167                                 fvert = &(vertices[filteredIdx]) ;
00168                                 
00169                                 if(dist(vert->x, vert->y, vert->z, fvert->x, fvert->y, fvert->z) <= params->clust_max_dist){
00170                                         groupCreatedFlag=1;
00171                                         /* Add a new pocket */
00172                                         if(resid == -1 && fvert->resid==-1){                                            
00173                                                 resid=++curPocket;
00174                                                 vert->resid=resid;
00175                                                 fvert->resid=curPocket; 
00176                                                 /* Create a new pocket */
00177                                                 s_pocket *pocket = alloc_pocket();                              
00178                                                 pocket->v_lst=c_lst_vertices_alloc();
00179                                                 /* Add vertices to the pocket */
00180                                                 c_lst_vertices_add_last(pocket->v_lst, vert);                           
00181                                                 c_lst_vertices_add_last(pocket->v_lst, fvert);
00182 
00183                                                 if(vert->type==M_APOLAR_AS) cur_n_apol++;
00184                                                 else cur_n_pol++;
00185 
00186                                                 if(fvert->type==M_APOLAR_AS)cur_n_apol++;
00187                                                 else cur_n_pol++;
00188 
00189                                                 c_lst_pockets_add_last(pockets, pocket,cur_n_apol,cur_n_pol);
00190                                         }
00191                                         /* Add new vertice to existing pocket */
00192                                         else if(resid!=-1 && fvert->resid==-1)                                          
00193                                         {
00194                                                 fvert->resid=resid;
00195                                                 node_pocket *pocket=searchPocket(resid,pockets);
00196                                                 if(pocket) c_lst_vertices_add_last(pocket->pocket->v_lst, fvert);
00197 
00198                                                 if(fvert->type==M_APOLAR_AS) pocket->pocket->nAlphaApol+=1;
00199                                                 else pocket->pocket->nAlphaPol+=1;
00200                                         }
00201                                         else if(resid==-1 && fvert->resid!=-1) {
00202                                                 vert->resid = fvert->resid;
00203                                                 resid=fvert->resid;
00204                                                 node_pocket *pocket = searchPocket(resid,pockets);
00205                                                 if(pocket) c_lst_vertices_add_last(pocket->pocket->v_lst, vert);
00206                                                 if(vert->type==M_APOLAR_AS) pocket->pocket->nAlphaApol+=1;
00207                                                 else pocket->pocket->nAlphaPol+=1;
00208                                         }
00209                                         else if((resid!=-1 && fvert->resid!=-1) && (resid!=fvert->resid)) {
00210                                                 node_pocket *pocket=searchPocket(resid,pockets);
00211                                                 node_pocket *pocket2=searchPocket(fvert->resid,pockets);
00212                                                 /* Write content of pocket1 into pocket2 */
00213                                                 mergePockets(pocket,pocket2,pockets);                                   
00214 
00215                                                 for(z=0;z<lvvert->nvert;z++){
00216                                                         /* Merge two clusters -> to optimize */
00217                                                         if(vertices[z].resid==resid) vertices[z].resid=fvert->resid;    
00218                                                 }
00219                                                 resid=fvert->resid;
00220 
00221                                         }
00222                                 }
00223                         }
00224                         else {
00225                                 if(filteredIdx >= lvvert->nvert) {
00226                                         fprintf(stdout, "INDEX ERROR\n") ;
00227                                 }
00228                         }
00229                 }
00230         }
00231         /* if a pocket was created return the pocket */
00232         if(groupCreatedFlag) return curPocket;
00233         
00234         /* if no vertice neighbours were found, still build a new pocket containing 
00235          * only one vertice */
00236         
00237         cur_n_apol=0;
00238         cur_n_pol=0;
00239         resid=++curPocket;
00240         vert->resid=resid;
00241         s_pocket *pocket=alloc_pocket();                                /* Create a new pocket */
00242         pocket->v_lst=c_lst_vertices_alloc();
00243         c_lst_vertices_add_last(pocket->v_lst, vert);   /* Add vertices to the pocket */
00244         if(vert->type==M_APOLAR_AS) cur_n_apol++;
00245         else cur_n_pol++;
00246 
00247         c_lst_pockets_add_last(pockets,pocket,cur_n_apol,cur_n_pol);
00248 
00249         return curPocket;
00250         
00251 }

00259 /**
00260    ## FUNCTION: 
00261         set_pocket_mtvolume
00262   
00263    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00264         Get an monte carlo approximation of the volume occupied by the pocket given
00265         in argument.
00266   
00267    ## PARAMETRES:
00268         @ s_pocket *pocket: Pockets to print
00269         @ int niter       : Number of monte carlo iteration
00270   
00271    ## RETURN:
00272         float: volume.
00273   
00274 */
00275 float set_pocket_mtvolume(s_pocket *pocket, int niter) 
00276 {
00277         int i = 0,
00278                 nb_in = 0,
00279                 nit = 0 ;
00280 
00281         float xmin = 0.0, xmax = 0.0,
00282                   ymin = 0.0, ymax = 0.0,
00283                   zmin = 0.0, zmax = 0.0,
00284                   xtmp = 0.0, ytmp = 0.0, ztmp = 0.0,
00285                   xr = 0.0, yr = 0.0, zr = 0.0,
00286                   vbox = 0.0 ;
00287 
00288         c_lst_vertices *vertices = pocket->v_lst ;
00289         node_vertice *cur = vertices->first ;
00290         s_vvertice *vcur = NULL ;
00291 
00292         /* First, search extrems coordinates */
00293         while(cur) {
00294                 vcur = cur->vertice ;
00295                 
00296                 /* Update min: */
00297                 if(nit == 0) {
00298                         xmin = vcur->x - vcur->ray ; xmax = vcur->x + vcur->ray ;
00299                         ymin = vcur->y - vcur->ray ; ymax = vcur->y + vcur->ray ;
00300                         zmin = vcur->z - vcur->ray ; zmax = vcur->z + vcur->ray ;
00301                 }
00302                 else {
00303                         if(xmin > (xtmp = vcur->x - vcur->ray)) xmin = xtmp ;
00304                         else if(xmax < (xtmp = vcur->x + vcur->ray)) xmax = xtmp ;
00305         
00306                         if(ymin > (ytmp = vcur->y - vcur->ray)) ymin = ytmp ;
00307                         else if(ymax < (ytmp = vcur->y + vcur->ray)) ymax = ytmp ;
00308         
00309                         if(zmin > (ztmp = vcur->z - vcur->ray)) zmin = ztmp ;
00310                         else if(zmax < (ztmp = vcur->z + vcur->ray)) zmax = ztmp ;
00311                 }
00312 
00313                 cur = cur->next ;
00314                 nit++ ;
00315         }
00316 
00317         /* Next calculate the box volume */
00318         vbox = (xmax - xmin)*(ymax - ymin)*(zmax - zmin) ;
00319         
00320         /* Then apply monte carlo approximation of the volume.   */
00321         for(i = 0 ; i < niter ; i++) {
00322                 xr = rand_uniform(xmin, xmax) ;
00323                 yr = rand_uniform(ymin, ymax) ;
00324                 zr = rand_uniform(zmin, zmax) ;
00325                 cur = vertices->first ;
00326                 
00327                 while(cur) {
00328                         vcur = cur->vertice ;
00329                 /* Distance between the center of curent vertice and the random point */
00330                         xtmp = vcur->x - xr ;
00331                         ytmp = vcur->y - yr ;
00332                         ztmp = vcur->z - zr ;
00333 
00334                 /* Compare r^2 and dist(center, random_point)^2  to avoid a call to sqrt() function */
00335                         if((vcur->ray*vcur->ray) > (xtmp*xtmp + ytmp*ytmp + ztmp*ztmp)) {
00336                         /* The point is inside one of the vertice!! */
00337                                 nb_in ++ ; break ;
00338                         }
00339                         cur = cur->next ;
00340                 }
00341         }
00342 
00343         pocket->pdesc->volume = ((float)nb_in)/((float)niter)*vbox ;
00344 
00345         /* Ok lets just return the volume Vpok = Nb_in/Niter*Vbox */
00346         return pocket->pdesc->volume ;
00347 }
00348 
00349 /**
00350    ## FUNCTION: 
00351         set_pocket_volume
00352   
00353    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00354         Get an approximation of the volume occupied by the pocket given in argument,
00355         using a discretized space.
00356   
00357    ## PARAMETRES:
00358         @ s_pocket *pocket: Pockets to print
00359         @ int idiscret    : Discretisation: the cube containing all vertices will be 
00360                                                 divided in idiscret*idiscret*idiscret cubes.
00361   
00362    ## RETURN:
00363         float: volume.
00364   
00365 */
00366 float set_pocket_volume(s_pocket *pocket, int idiscret) 
00367 {
00368         int niter = 0,
00369                 nb_in = 0,
00370                 nit = 0 ;
00371 
00372         float discret = 1.0/(float)idiscret ;
00373 
00374         float x = 0.0, y = 0.0, z = 0.0,
00375                   xstep = 0.0, ystep = 0.0, zstep = 0.0 ;
00376 
00377         float xmin = 0.0, xmax = 0.0,
00378                   ymin = 0.0, ymax = 0.0,
00379                   zmin = 0.0, zmax = 0.0,
00380                   xtmp = 0.0, ytmp = 0.0, ztmp = 0.0,
00381                   vbox = 0.0 ;
00382 
00383         c_lst_vertices *vertices = pocket->v_lst ;
00384         node_vertice *cur = vertices->first ;
00385         s_vvertice *vcur = NULL ;
00386 
00387         /* First, search extrems coordinates */
00388         while(cur) {
00389                 vcur = cur->vertice ;
00390                 
00391                 /* Update min: */
00392                 if(nit == 0) {
00393                         xmin = vcur->x - vcur->ray ; xmax = vcur->x + vcur->ray ;
00394                         ymin = vcur->y - vcur->ray ; ymax = vcur->y + vcur->ray ;
00395                         zmin = vcur->z - vcur->ray ; zmax = vcur->z + vcur->ray ;
00396                 }
00397                 else {
00398                         if(xmin > (xtmp = vcur->x - vcur->ray)) xmin = xtmp ;
00399                         else if(xmax < (xtmp = vcur->x + vcur->ray)) xmax = xtmp ;
00400         
00401                         if(ymin > (ytmp = vcur->y - vcur->ray)) ymin = ytmp ;
00402                         else if(ymax < (ytmp = vcur->y + vcur->ray)) ymax = ytmp ;
00403         
00404                         if(zmin > (ztmp = vcur->z - vcur->ray)) zmin = ztmp ;
00405                         else if(zmax < (ztmp = vcur->z + vcur->ray)) zmax = ztmp ;
00406                 }
00407 
00408                 cur = cur->next ;
00409                 nit++ ;
00410         }
00411 
00412         /* Next calculate the box volume */
00413         vbox = (xmax - xmin)*(ymax - ymin)*(zmax - zmin) ;
00414 
00415         xstep = discret * (xmax - xmin) ;
00416         ystep = discret * (ymax - ymin) ;
00417         zstep = discret * (zmax - zmin) ;
00418 
00419         /* Then apply monte carlo approximation of the volume.   */
00420         for(x = xmin ; x < xmax ; x += xstep) {
00421                 for(y = ymin ; y < ymax ; y += ystep) { 
00422                         for(z = zmin ; z < zmax ; z += zstep) {
00423                                 cur = vertices->first ;
00424                                 while(cur) {
00425                                         vcur = cur->vertice ;
00426                                         xtmp = vcur->x - x ;
00427                                         ytmp = vcur->y - y ;
00428                                         ztmp = vcur->z - z ;
00429                 
00430                                 /* Compare r^2 and dist(center, random_point)^2 */
00431                                         if((vcur->ray*vcur->ray) > (xtmp*xtmp + ytmp*ytmp + ztmp*ztmp)) {
00432                                         /*the point is inside one of the vertice!! */
00433                                                 nb_in ++ ; break ;
00434                                         }
00435                                         cur = cur->next ;
00436                                 }
00437                                 niter ++ ;
00438                         }
00439                 }
00440         }
00441 
00442         pocket->pdesc->volume = ((float)nb_in)/((float)niter)*vbox ;
00443 
00444         /* Ok lets just return the volume Vpok = Nb_in/Niter*Vbox */
00445         return pocket->pdesc->volume ;
00446 }
00447 
00448 /**
00449    ## FUNCTION: 
00450         set_pockets_bary
00451   
00452    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00453         Set barycenter of each pockets. Use vertices to do so.
00454   
00455    ## PARAMETRES:
00456         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets: The list of pockets to handle
00457   
00458    ## RETURN:
00459         void
00460   
00461 */
00462 void set_pockets_bary(c_lst_pockets *pockets)
00463 {
00464         node_pocket *cur = NULL ;
00465         s_pocket *pcur = NULL ;
00466 
00467         float xsum, ysum, zsum ;
00468         int n ;
00469 
00470         if(pockets && pockets->n_pockets > 0) {
00471                 cur = pockets->first ;
00472                 while(cur) {
00473                         pcur = cur->pocket ;
00474                 /* Reset values and calculate barycenter */
00475                         xsum = 0.0 ; ysum = 0.0 ; zsum = 0.0 ; 
00476                         n = 0 ;
00477 
00478                         node_vertice *nvcur = pcur->v_lst->first ;
00479                         while(nvcur) {
00480                                 xsum += nvcur->vertice->x ;
00481                                 ysum += nvcur->vertice->y ;
00482                                 zsum += nvcur->vertice->z ;
00483                                 n ++ ;
00484 
00485                                 nvcur = nvcur->next ;
00486                         }
00487 
00488                         pcur->bary[0] = xsum / (float) n ;
00489                         pcur->bary[1] = ysum / (float) n ;
00490                         pcur->bary[2] = zsum / (float) n ;
00491 
00492                         cur = cur->next ;
00493                 }
00494         }
00495 }
00496 
00497 /**
00498    ## FUNCTION: 
00499         set_descriptors
00500   
00501    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00502         Set descriptors for a list of pockets.
00503   
00504    ## PARAMETRES:
00505         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets: The list of pockets to handle
00506   
00507    ## RETURN:
00508         void
00509   
00510 */
00511 void set_pockets_descriptors(c_lst_pockets *pockets,int niter)
00512 {
00513         node_pocket *cur = NULL ;
00514         s_pocket *pcur = NULL ;
00515         
00516         int natms = 0, i ;
00517 
00518         if(pockets && pockets->n_pockets > 0) {
00519                 cur = pockets->first ;
00520                 /* Perform a first loop to calculate atom and vertice based descriptors */
00521                 while(cur) {
00522                         pcur = cur->pocket ;
00523 
00524                         /* Get a list of vertices in a tab of pointer */
00525                         s_vvertice **tab_vert = (s_vvertice **)
00526                                         my_malloc(pcur->v_lst->n_vertices*sizeof(s_vvertice*)) ;
00527                         i = 0 ;
00528                         node_vertice *nvcur = pcur->v_lst->first ;
00529                         while(nvcur) {
00530                                 tab_vert[i] = nvcur->vertice ;
00531                                 nvcur = nvcur->next ;
00532                                 i++ ;
00533                         }
00534 
00535                         /* Get atoms contacted by vertices, and calculate descriptors */
00536                         s_atm **pocket_atoms = get_pocket_contacted_atms(pcur, &natms) ;
00537 
00538                         /* Calculate descriptors*/
00539                         set_descriptors(pocket_atoms, natms, tab_vert,
00540                                                         pcur->v_lst->n_vertices, pcur->pdesc,niter) ;
00541 
00542                         my_free(pocket_atoms) ;
00543                         my_free(tab_vert) ;
00544 
00545                         cur = cur->next ;
00546                 }
00547 
00548                 /* Set normalized descriptors */
00549                 set_normalized_descriptors(pockets) ;
00550 
00551                 /* Score all pockets */
00552                 cur = pockets->first ;
00553                 while(cur) {
00554                         cur->pocket->score = score_pocket(cur->pocket->pdesc) ;
00555 
00556                         cur = cur->next ;
00557                 }
00558         }
00559 }
00560 
00561 
00562 /**
00563    ## FUNCTION:
00564         set_normalized_descriptors
00565   
00566    ## SPECIFICATION:
00567          Perform normalisation for some descriptors, so that the maximum value of a
00568          given descriptor become 1 and the minimum value 0. This way, each descriptor
00569          is normalized and take into account relative differences between pockets.
00570          To do so, we use the simple formula:
00571                 Dnorm = (D - Dmin) / (Dmax - Dmin)
00572          with Dmin (resp. dmax) being the minimum (resp. maximum) value of the
00573          descriptor D observed in all detected pockets.
00574 
00575      WARNING: It is assumed that basic descriptors have been normalized before
00576          calling this function!
00577   
00578    ## PARAMETRES:
00579         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets : The list of pockets
00580   
00581    ## RETURN:
00582     void: s_desc is filled
00583   
00584 */
00585 void set_normalized_descriptors(c_lst_pockets *pockets)
00586 {
00587         
00588         if(!pockets || pockets->n_pockets <= 0) return ;
00589 
00590         node_pocket *cur = NULL ;
00591         s_desc *dcur = NULL ;
00592 
00593         /* Some boundaries to help normalisation */
00594         float flex_M = 0.0, flex_m = 1.0,
00595                   nas_apolp_M = 0.0, nas_apolp_m = 1.0,
00596                   density_M = 0.0, density_m = 100.0,
00597                   mlhd_M = 0.0, mlhd_m = 1000.0,
00598                   as_max_dst_M = 0.0, as_max_dst_m = 1000.0 ;
00599 
00600         int nas_M = 0, nas_m = 1000,
00601                 polarity_M = -1, polarity_m = 10000 ;
00602 
00603         cur = pockets->first ;
00604         /* Perform a first processing step, to set min and max for example */
00605         while(cur) {
00606                 dcur = cur->pocket->pdesc ;
00607                 /* Initialize boundaries if it's the first turn */
00608                 if(cur == pockets->first) {
00609                         as_max_dst_M = as_max_dst_m = dcur->as_max_dst ;
00610                         density_M = density_m = dcur->as_density ;
00611                         polarity_M = polarity_m = dcur->polarity_score ;
00612                         flex_M = flex_m = dcur->flex ;
00613                         nas_apolp_M = nas_apolp_m = dcur->apolar_asphere_prop ;
00614                         mlhd_M = mlhd_m = dcur->mean_loc_hyd_dens ;
00615                         nas_M = nas_m = dcur->nb_asph ;
00616                 }
00617                 else {
00618                 /* Update several boundaries */
00619                         if(dcur->as_max_dst > as_max_dst_M)
00620                                 as_max_dst_M = dcur->as_max_dst ;
00621                         else if(dcur->as_max_dst < as_max_dst_m)
00622                                 as_max_dst_m = dcur->as_max_dst ;
00623 
00624                         if(dcur->as_density > density_M)
00625                                 density_M = dcur->as_density ;
00626                         else if(dcur->as_density < density_m)
00627                                 density_m = dcur->as_density ;
00628 
00629                         if(dcur->polarity_score > polarity_M)
00630                                 polarity_M = dcur->polarity_score ;
00631                         else if(dcur->polarity_score < polarity_m)
00632                                 polarity_m = dcur->polarity_score ;
00633 
00634                         if(dcur->mean_loc_hyd_dens > mlhd_M)
00635                                 mlhd_M =dcur->mean_loc_hyd_dens ;
00636                         else if(dcur->mean_loc_hyd_dens < mlhd_m)
00637                                 mlhd_m =dcur->mean_loc_hyd_dens ;
00638 
00639                         if(dcur->flex > flex_M) flex_M = dcur->flex ;
00640                         else if(dcur->flex < flex_m) flex_m = dcur->flex ;
00641 
00642                         if(dcur->nb_asph > nas_M) nas_M = dcur->nb_asph ;
00643                         else if(dcur->nb_asph < nas_m) nas_m = dcur->nb_asph ;
00644 
00645                         if(dcur->apolar_asphere_prop > nas_apolp_M)
00646                                 nas_apolp_M = dcur->apolar_asphere_prop ;
00647                         else if(dcur->apolar_asphere_prop < nas_apolp_m)
00648                                 nas_apolp_m = dcur->apolar_asphere_prop;
00649                 }
00650 
00651                 cur = cur->next ;
00652         }
00653 
00654         /* Perform a second loop to do the actual normalisation */
00655         cur = pockets->first ;
00656         while(cur) {
00657                 dcur = cur->pocket->pdesc ;
00658                 /* Calculate normalized descriptors */
00659                 dcur->as_max_dst_norm =
00660                         (dcur->as_max_dst - as_max_dst_m) / (as_max_dst_M - as_max_dst_m) ;
00661 
00662                 dcur->as_density_norm =
00663                         (dcur->as_density - density_m) / (density_M - density_m) ;
00664 
00665                 dcur->polarity_score_norm =
00666                         (float)(dcur->polarity_score - polarity_m) /
00667                         (float)(polarity_M - polarity_m) ;
00668 
00669                 dcur->mean_loc_hyd_dens_norm =
00670                         (dcur->mean_loc_hyd_dens - mlhd_m) / (mlhd_M - mlhd_m) ;
00671 
00672                 dcur->flex = (dcur->flex - flex_m) / (flex_M - flex_m) ;
00673                 dcur->nas_norm = (float) (dcur->nb_asph - nas_m) /
00674                                                                 (float) (nas_M - nas_m) ;
00675                 dcur->prop_asapol_norm =
00676                         (dcur->apolar_asphere_prop - nas_apolp_m)
00677                         / (nas_apolp_M - nas_apolp_m);
00678 
00679                 cur = cur->next ;
00680         }
00681 }
00682 
00683 
00684 /**
00685  ================================================================================
00686  ================================================================================
00687 
00688         FUNCTIONS FOR POCKET CHAINED LIST OPERATIONS
00689 
00690  ================================================================================
00691  ================================================================================
00692 */
00693 
00694 /**
00695    ## FONCTION: 
00696         c_lst_pockets_add_first
00697   
00698    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00699         Add a pocket on the first position of the list
00700   
00701    ## PARAMETRES:
00702         @ c_lst_pocket *lst : chained list of pockets
00703         @ s_pocket                      : pocket to add
00704   
00705    ## RETURN:
00706         node_pocket *: pointer to the new node.
00707   
00708 */
00709 node_pocket *c_lst_pockets_add_first(c_lst_pockets *lst, s_pocket *pocket)
00710 {
00711         node_pocket *newn = NULL ;
00712 
00713         if(lst) {
00714                 newn = node_pocket_alloc(pocket) ;
00715                 lst->first->prev = newn ;
00716                 newn->next = lst->first ;
00717 
00718                 lst->first = newn ;
00719                 lst->n_pockets += 1 ;
00720         }
00721         
00722         return newn ;
00723 }
00724 
00725 /**
00726    ## FONCTION: 
00727         c_lst_pockets_add_last
00728   
00729    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00730         Add a pocket at the end of the chained list
00731   
00732    ## PARAMETRES:
00733         @ c_lst_pocket *lst : chained list of pockets
00734         @ s_pocket          : pocket to add
00735   
00736    ## RETURN:
00737         node_pocket *: Pointer to the new pocket.
00738   
00739 */
00740 node_pocket *c_lst_pockets_add_last(c_lst_pockets *lst,s_pocket *pocket,int cur_n_apol, int cur_n_pol)
00741 {
00742         node_pocket *newn = NULL ;
00743 
00744         if(lst) {
00745                 newn = node_pocket_alloc(pocket) ;
00746                 newn->pocket->nAlphaApol = cur_n_apol;
00747                 newn->pocket->nAlphaPol = cur_n_pol;
00748                 if(lst->last) {
00749                         newn->prev = lst->last ;
00750                         lst->last->next = newn ;
00751                 }
00752                 else {
00753                         lst->first = newn ;
00754 
00755                 }
00756                 lst->last = newn ;
00757                 lst->n_pockets += 1 ;
00758         }
00759 
00760         return newn ;
00761 }
00762 
00763 /**
00764    ## FUNCTION: 
00765         swap_pockets 
00766   
00767    ## SPECIFICATION:
00768         Swap two pockets in the given list (not that easy !!! ;) )
00769   
00770    ## PARAMETRES:
00771         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets : The list of pockets
00772         @ const node_pocket *p1  : Pocket 1
00773         @ const node_pocket *p2  : Pocket 2
00774   
00775    ## RETURN:
00776         void
00777   
00778 */
00779 void swap_pockets(c_lst_pockets *pockets, node_pocket *p1, node_pocket *p2) 
00780 {
00781         node_pocket *p1prev = p1->prev,
00782                                 *p1next = p1->next,
00783                                 *p2prev = p2->prev,
00784                                 *p2next = p2->next ;
00785         
00786         if(p1->next == p2) {
00787         /* If p1 is just before p2 (p1 can't be the last one and p2 can't be
00788          * the first one) */
00789                 if(p1->prev) p1->prev->next = p2 ;
00790                 else pockets->first = p2 ; /* P1 is the first of the list */
00791 
00792                 if(p2->next) p2->next->prev = p1 ;
00793                 else pockets->last = p2 ; /* P2 is the last one */
00794 
00795                 p2->next = p1 ;
00796                 p2->prev = p1prev ;
00797                 p1->prev = p2 ;
00798                 p1->next = p2next ;
00799         }
00800         else if(p1->prev == p2) {
00801         /* If p1 is just after p2 (p2 can't be the last one and p1 can't be
00802          * the first one) */
00803                 if(p1->next) p1->next->prev = p2 ;
00804                 else pockets->last = p2 ; /* p1 is the last one */
00805                 
00806                 if(p2->prev) p2->prev->next = p1 ;
00807                 else pockets->first = p1 ;
00808 
00809                 p1->next = p2 ;
00810                 p1->prev = p2prev ;
00811                 p2->prev = p1 ;
00812                 p2->next = p1next;
00813         }
00814         else {
00815         /* If p1 and p2 are far away from each others in the list */
00816         /* Handle p1 */
00817                 if(p1->next) {
00818                 /* If there is a pocket after p1, p1 is not the last one */
00819                         p1->next->prev = p2 ;   /* p2 should be the new prev of p1's next */
00820                         if(p1->prev) p1->prev->next = p2 ;
00821                         else pockets->first = p2 ;
00822                 }
00823                 else {
00824                 /* p1 is the last pocket of the list */
00825                         
00826                         pockets->last = p2 ;
00827                         if(p1->prev) {
00828                                 p1->prev->next = p2 ;
00829                         }
00830                 }
00831 
00832         /* Handle P2 */
00833                 if(p2->next) {
00834                 /* If there is a pocket after p1, p1 is not the last one */
00835                         p2->next->prev = p1 ;   /* p2 should be the new prev of p1's next */
00836                         if(p2->prev) p2->prev->next = p1 ;
00837                         else pockets->first = p1 ;
00838                 }
00839                 else {
00840                 /* p1 is the last pocket of the list */
00841                         if(p2->prev) {
00842                                 p2->prev->next = p1 ;
00843                                 pockets->last = p1 ;
00844                         }
00845                 }
00846 
00847                 p1->next = p2next ;
00848                 p1->prev = p2prev ;
00849 
00850                 p2->next = p1next ;
00851                 p2->prev = p1prev ;
00852                 
00853         }
00854 }
00855 
00856 /**
00857    ## FUNCTION: 
00858         searchPocket
00859   
00860    ## SPECIFICATION:
00861         Search a pocket
00862   
00863    ## PARAMETRES:
00864         @ int resid                      : ID of the pocket
00865         @ c_lst_pockets *lst : The list of pockets
00866   
00867    ## RETURN:
00868         node_pocket *: pointer to the pocket found. 
00869   
00870 */
00871 node_pocket *searchPocket(int resid, c_lst_pockets *lst)
00872 {
00873         node_pocket *cur = NULL ;
00874         
00875         if(lst) {
00876                 cur = lst->first ;
00877                 while(cur && cur->pocket->v_lst->first->vertice->resid != resid) {
00878                         cur = cur->next ;
00879         }
00880         }
00881 
00882         return cur;
00883 }
00884 
00885 /**
00886    ## FONCTION: 
00887         void dropPocket(c_lst_pockets *pockets,node_pocket *pocket)
00888   
00889    ## SPECIFICATION: 
00890         Drop a pocket from the list.
00891   
00892    ## PARAMETRES:
00893         @ c_lst_pockets *lst  : The list.
00894         @ node_pocket *pocket : The pocket to drop
00895   
00896    ## RETURN:
00897         void
00898   
00899 */
00900 void dropPocket(c_lst_pockets *pockets, node_pocket *pocket)
00901 {
00902         
00903         if(pocket->prev && pocket->next){
00904                 pocket->prev->next = pocket->next;
00905                 pocket->next->prev = pocket->prev;
00906         }
00907         else if(pocket->next){
00908                 pocket->next->prev = NULL;
00909                 pockets->first = pocket->next;
00910         }
00911         else if(pocket->prev){
00912                 pocket->prev->next = NULL;
00913                 pockets->last = pocket->prev;
00914         }
00915 
00916         pocket->next = NULL ;
00917         pocket->prev = NULL ;
00918         pockets->n_pockets -= 1;
00919 
00920         my_free(pocket->pocket->pdesc);
00921         pocket->pocket->pdesc = NULL ;
00922         my_free(pocket->pocket);
00923         pocket->pocket= NULL;
00924 
00925         my_free(pocket);
00926 
00927         if(pockets->n_pockets == 0) pockets->first = NULL ;
00928 }
00929 
00930 /**
00931    ## FUNCTION: 
00932          mergePockets
00933   
00934    ## SPECIFICATION:
00935         Merge two pockets.
00936   
00937    ## PARAMETRES:
00938         @ node_pocket *pocket: The first pocket
00939         @ node_pocket *pocket2: The second pocket
00940         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets: The list of pockets
00941   
00942    ## RETURN:
00943         void
00944   
00945 */
00946 void mergePockets(node_pocket *pocket,node_pocket *pocket2,c_lst_pockets *pockets)
00947 {
00948         s_pocket *pock =  pocket->pocket,
00949                          *pock2 = pocket2->pocket ;
00950 
00951         pock->nAlphaApol += pock2->nAlphaApol;
00952         pock->nAlphaPol += pock2->nAlphaPol;
00953         pock->v_lst->n_vertices += pock2->v_lst->n_vertices;
00954         pock->size = pock->v_lst->n_vertices ;
00955         
00956         pock->v_lst->last->next = pock2->v_lst->first;
00957         pock->v_lst->last = pock2->v_lst->last;
00958         pocket2->pocket->v_lst = NULL;
00959 
00960         my_free(pocket2->pocket);
00961         pocket2->pocket=NULL;
00962         
00963         if(pocket2->prev && pocket2->next){
00964                 pocket2->prev->next = pocket2->next;
00965                 pocket2->next->prev = pocket2->prev;
00966         }
00967         else if(pocket2->next){
00968                 pockets->first=pocket2->next;
00969                 pocket2->next->prev=NULL;
00970         }
00971         else if(pocket2->prev){
00972 
00973                 pocket2->prev->next=NULL;
00974                 pockets->last=pocket2->prev;
00975         }
00976         else if(!pocket2->prev && !pocket2->next) my_free(pocket2);
00977 
00978         pockets->n_pockets-=1;
00979         my_free(pocket2);
00980 }
00981 
00982 /**
00983  ================================================================================
00984  ================================================================================
00985 
00986         ALLOCATIONS AND DESALLOCATIONS FOR POCKET AND CHAINED LIST OF POCKET 
00987 
00988  ================================================================================
00989  ================================================================================
00990 */
00991 
00992 /**
00993    ## FUNCTION: 
00994         alloc_pocket 
00995   
00996    ## SPECIFICATION:
00997         Alloc memory for a pocket and reste values describing it.
00998   
00999    ## PARAMETRES:
01000   
01001    ## RETURN:
01002         s_pocket* : pointer to the pocket allocated. 
01003   
01004 */
01005 s_pocket* alloc_pocket(void) 
01006 {
01007         s_pocket *p = (s_pocket*)my_malloc(sizeof(s_pocket)) ;
01008         p->pdesc = (s_desc*)my_malloc(sizeof(s_desc)) ;
01009         p->v_lst = NULL ;
01010 
01011         reset_pocket(p) ;
01012 
01013         return p ;
01014 }
01015 
01016 /**
01017    ## FONCTION: 
01018    c_lst_pockets_alloc
01019   
01020    ## SPECIFICATION: 
01021         Allocate a list of pockets
01022   
01023    ## PARAMETRES:
01024   
01025    ## RETURN:
01026         c_lst_pockets*
01027   
01028 */
01029 c_lst_pockets *c_lst_pockets_alloc(void) 
01030 {
01031         c_lst_pockets *lst = (c_lst_pockets *)my_malloc(sizeof(c_lst_pockets)) ;
01032 
01033         lst->first = NULL ;
01034         lst->last = NULL ;
01035         lst->current = NULL ;
01036         lst->n_pockets = 0 ;
01037         lst->vertices = NULL ;
01038 
01039         return lst ;
01040 }
01041 
01042 /**
01043    ## FONCTION: 
01044         node_pocket_alloc
01045   
01046    ## SPECIFICATION: 
01047         Allocate memory for one pocket node
01048   
01049    ## PARAMETRES:
01050         @ s_pocket *pocket : pointer to the pocket
01051   
01052    ## RETURN:
01053         node_pocket*
01054   
01055 */
01056 node_pocket *node_pocket_alloc(s_pocket *pocket)
01057 {
01058         node_pocket *n_pocket = (node_pocket*)my_malloc(sizeof(node_pocket)) ;
01059 
01060         n_pocket->next = NULL ;
01061         n_pocket->prev = NULL ;
01062         n_pocket->pocket = pocket ;
01063         
01064         return n_pocket ;
01065 }
01066 
01067 
01068 /**
01069    ## FONCTION: 
01070         c_lst_pocket_free
01071   
01072    ## SPECIFICATION: 
01073         Free a pocket list.
01074   
01075    ## PARAMETRES:
01076         @ c_lst_pockets *lst: The list to free.
01077   
01078    ## RETURN:
01079         void
01080   
01081 */
01082 void c_lst_pocket_free(c_lst_pockets *lst) 
01083 {
01084         node_pocket *cur = NULL,
01085                                 *next = NULL ;
01086         
01087         if(lst) {
01088                 cur = lst->first ;
01089                 while(cur) {
01090                         next = cur->next ;
01091                         dropPocket(lst, cur) ;
01092                         cur = next ;
01093         }
01094 
01095                 free_vert_lst(lst->vertices) ;
01096 
01097                 lst->vertices = NULL ;
01098                 lst->first = NULL ;     
01099                 lst->last = NULL ;
01100                 lst->current = NULL ;
01101 
01102                 my_free(lst) ;
01103         }
01104 
01105 }
01106 
01107                                 // //
01108                                 // SORTING FUNCTION (REARANGE CHAINED LIST TO HAVE //
01109                                 // POCKETS SORTED ACCORDING TO SEVERAL PROPERTIES) //
01110                                 // //
01111 
01112 /**
01113  ================================================================================
01114  ================================================================================
01115 
01116         OTHER FUNCTIONS (contacted atoms, print...)
01117 
01118  ================================================================================
01119  ================================================================================
01120 */
01121 
01122 /**
01123    ## FUNCTION:
01124         get_pocket_contacted_atms
01125   
01126    ## SPECIFICATION: 
01127         Get all atoms contacted by the alpha spheres of a given pocket.
01128   
01129    ## PARAMETRES:
01130         @ s_pocket *pocket : The pocket
01131         @ int *natoms      : OUTPUT Number of atoms found (modified)
01132   
01133    ## RETURN:
01134         s_atm** Modify the value of natoms, and return an array of pointer to atoms.
01135   
01136 */
01137 s_atm** get_pocket_contacted_atms(s_pocket *pocket, int *natoms)
01138 {
01139         int actual_size = 10,
01140                 nb_atoms = 0,
01141                 i = 0 ;
01142         
01143         node_vertice *nvcur = NULL ;
01144         s_vvertice *vcur = NULL ;
01145 
01146         s_atm **catoms = NULL ;
01147         
01148         if(pocket && pocket->v_lst && pocket->v_lst->n_vertices > 0) {
01149         /* Remember atoms already stored. */
01150                 int atm_ids[pocket->v_lst->n_vertices * 4] ;
01151 
01152         /* Do the search  */
01153                 catoms = (s_atm **)my_malloc(actual_size*sizeof(s_atm*)) ;
01154                 nvcur = pocket->v_lst->first ;
01155                 while(nvcur) {
01156                         vcur = nvcur->vertice ;
01157                         /*printf("ID in the pocket: %d (%.3f %.3f %.3f\n", vcur->id, vcur->x, vcur->y, vcur->z) ;*/
01158                         for(i = 0 ; i < 4 ; i++) {
01159                                 if(in_tab(atm_ids,  nb_atoms, vcur->neigh[i]->id) == 0) {
01160                                         if(nb_atoms >= actual_size) {
01161                                                 catoms = (s_atm **)my_realloc(catoms, (actual_size+10)*sizeof(s_atm**)) ;
01162                                                 actual_size += 10 ;
01163                                         }
01164         
01165                                         atm_ids[nb_atoms] = vcur->neigh[i]->id ;
01166                                         catoms[nb_atoms] = vcur->neigh[i] ;
01167                                         nb_atoms ++ ;
01168                                 }
01169                         }
01170                         nvcur = nvcur->next ;
01171                 }
01172         }
01173 
01174         *natoms = nb_atoms ;
01175         
01176         return catoms ;
01177 }
01178 
01179 /**
01180    ## FUNCTION:
01181         count_pocket_contacted_atms
01182   
01183    ## SPECIFICATION:
01184         Count all uniq atoms contacted by the alpha spheres of a given pocket.
01185   
01186    ## PARAMETRES:
01187         @ s_pocket *pocket : The pocket
01188   
01189    ## RETURN:
01190         int: Number of atoms involed in the pocket
01191   
01192 */
01193 int count_pocket_contacted_atms(s_pocket *pocket)
01194 {
01195         if(!pocket || !(pocket->v_lst) || pocket->v_lst->n_vertices <= 0) return -1 ;
01196 
01197         int nb_atoms = 0,
01198                 i = 0 ;
01199 
01200         node_vertice *nvcur = NULL ;
01201         s_vvertice *vcur = NULL ;
01202 
01203         /* Remember atoms already stored. */
01204         int atm_ids[pocket->v_lst->n_vertices * 4] ;
01205 
01206         /* Do the search  */
01207         nvcur = pocket->v_lst->first ;
01208         while(nvcur) {
01209                 vcur = nvcur->vertice ;
01210                 /*printf("ID in the pocket: %d (%.3f %.3f %.3f\n", vcur->id, vcur->x, vcur->y, vcur->z) ;*/
01211                 for(i = 0 ; i < 4 ; i++) {
01212                         if(in_tab(atm_ids,  nb_atoms, vcur->neigh[i]->id) == 0) {
01213                                 atm_ids[nb_atoms] = vcur->neigh[i]->id ;
01214                                 nb_atoms ++ ;
01215                         }
01216                 }
01217                 nvcur = nvcur->next ;
01218         }
01219 
01220         return nb_atoms ;
01221 }
01222 
01223 /**
01224    ## FUNCTION:
01225         get_pocket_contacted_atms
01226   
01227    ## SPECIFICATION:
01228         Get pocket vertices under the form of an array of pointer.
01229   
01230    ## PARAMETRES:
01231         @ s_pocket *pocket : The pocket
01232   
01233    ## RETURN:
01234         s_vvertice**: All pointers to vertices
01235   
01236 */
01237 s_vvertice** get_pocket_pvertices(s_pocket *pocket)
01238 {
01239         s_vvertice **pverts = my_calloc(pocket->size, sizeof(s_vvertice*)) ;
01240         int i = 0 ;
01241         node_vertice *nvcur = pocket->v_lst->first ;
01242         while(nvcur) {
01243                 pverts[i] = nvcur->vertice ;
01244                 nvcur = nvcur->next ;
01245                 i++ ;
01246         }
01247 
01248         return pverts ;
01249 }
01250 
01251 /**
01252    ## FUNCTION: 
01253         reset_pocket
01254   
01255    ## SPECIFICATION: 
01256         Reset pocket descriptors
01257   
01258    ## PARAMETRES:
01259         @ s_pocket *pocket: The pocket.
01260   
01261    ## RETURN:
01262         void
01263   
01264 */
01265 
01266 void reset_pocket(s_pocket *pocket)
01267 {
01268         pocket->rank = -1 ;
01269 
01270         pocket->score = 0.0 ;
01271         pocket->ovlp = -2.0 ;
01272         pocket->ovlp2 = -2.0 ;
01273         pocket->vol_corresp = -2.0 ;
01274 
01275         pocket->nAlphaPol = 0 ;
01276         pocket->nAlphaApol = 0 ;
01277 
01278         reset_desc(pocket->pdesc) ;
01279 }
01280 
01281 /**
01282    ## FUNCTION: 
01283         print_pockets
01284   
01285    ## SPECIFICATION: 
01286         Print pockets info in the given buffer
01287   
01288    ## PARAMETRES:
01289         @ FILE *f                                : File to print in
01290         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets : All pockets
01291   
01292    ## RETURN:
01293         void
01294   
01295 */
01296 void print_pockets(FILE *f, c_lst_pockets *pockets) 
01297 {
01298         node_pocket *cur = pockets->first ;
01299         if(pockets) {
01300                 fprintf(f, "\n## FPOCKET RESULTS ##\n");
01301                 cur = pockets->first;
01302                 while(cur) {
01303                         print_pocket(f, cur->pocket) ;
01304                         cur = cur->next ;
01305                 }
01306         }
01307         else {
01308                 fprintf(f, "\n## NO POCKETS IN THE LIST ##\n");
01309         }
01310 }
01311 
01312 /**
01313    ## FUNCTION: 
01314         print_pockets_inv
01315   
01316    ## SPECIFICATION: 
01317         Print pockets info in the given buffer, starting with the last pocket of the
01318         chained list.
01319   
01320    ## PARAMETRES:
01321         @ FILE *f                               : File to print in
01322         @ c_lst_pockets *pockets: Pockets to print
01323   
01324    ## RETURN:
01325         void
01326   
01327 */
01328 void print_pockets_inv(FILE *f, c_lst_pockets *pockets) 
01329 {
01330         if(pockets) {
01331                 fprintf(f, "\n## POCKET ##\n");
01332                 node_pocket *cur = pockets->last ;
01333                 while(cur) {
01334                         print_pocket(f, cur->pocket) ;
01335                         cur = cur->prev ;
01336                 }
01337         }
01338         else {
01339                 fprintf(f, "\n## NO POCKETS IN THE LIST ##\n");
01340         }
01341 }
01342 
01343 /**
01344    ## FUNCTION: 
01345         void print_pocket(FILE *f, s_pocket *pocket) 
01346   
01347    ## SPECIFICATION: 
01348         Print one pocket info in the given buffer
01349   
01350    ## PARAMETRES:
01351         @ FILE *f                       : File to print in
01352         @ s_pocket *pocket  : Pocket to print
01353   
01354    ## RETURN:
01355         void
01356   
01357 */
01358 void print_pocket(FILE *f, s_pocket *pocket) 
01359 {
01360         if(pocket) {
01361                 fprintf(f, "\n## POCKET %d ##\n",pocket->v_lst->first->vertice->resid);
01362                 
01363                 if(pocket->ovlp > -1.0) fprintf(f, "\t Correspondance: %f\n", pocket->ovlp) ;
01364                 if(pocket->vol_corresp > -1.0) fprintf(f, "\t Volume Correspondance: %f\n", pocket->vol_corresp) ;
01365                 fprintf(f, "\t 0  - Pocket Score:                %.4f\n", pocket->score) ;
01366                 fprintf(f, "\t 1  - Number of Voronoi vertices:  %d\n", pocket->pdesc->nb_asph) ;
01367                 fprintf(f, "\t 2  - Mean alpha-sphere radius:    %f\n", pocket->pdesc->mean_asph_ray) ;
01368                 fprintf(f, "\t 3  - Mean alpha-sphere solvent accessibility: %f\n", pocket->pdesc->masph_sacc) ;
01369                 fprintf(f, "\t 4  - Flexibility:                 %f\n", pocket->pdesc->flex) ;
01370                 fprintf(f, "\t 5  - Hydrophobicity Score:        %f\n", pocket->pdesc->hydrophobicity_score) ;
01371                 fprintf(f, "\t 6  - Polarity Score:              %d\n", pocket->pdesc->polarity_score) ;
01372                 fprintf(f, "\t 7  - Volume Score:                %f\n", pocket->pdesc->volume_score) ;
01373                 fprintf(f, "\t 8  - Real volume (approximation): %f\n", pocket->pdesc->volume) ;
01374                 fprintf(f, "\t 9  - Charge Score:                %d\n", pocket->pdesc->charge_score) ;
01375                 fprintf(f, "\t 10 - Local hydrophobic density Score: %f\n", pocket->pdesc->mean_loc_hyd_dens) ;
01376                 fprintf(f, "\t 11 - Number of apolar alpha sphere: %d\n", pocket->nAlphaApol) ;
01377                 fprintf(f, "\t 12 - Amino acid composition:\n") ;
01378                 int i ;
01379                 fprintf(f, "\t 12 - ") ;
01380                 for(i = 0 ; i < M_NB_AA ; i++) fprintf(f, "%3d ", pocket->pdesc->aa_compo[i]) ;
01381                 fprintf(f, "\n") ;
01382         }
01383 }
